ERROR.UNKNOWN: Sorry, an error occured while performing the requested operation.
ERROR.BAD_REQUEST: An error occured while performing the requested operation
ERROR.NOT_FOUND: The resource you are trying to access does not exist
ERROR.UNAUTHORIZED: You should sign in in order to perform the requested operation.
ERROR.FORBIDDEN: You are not allowed to perform the requested operation
ERROR.INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR: Sorry, an unexpected error occured while performing the requested operation.
ERROR.QUOTA-EXCEEDED-RUNTIME-APPS: As a trial user, you can only have {{quota}} apps deployed at the same time.
ERROR.QUOTA-EXCEEDED-LICENSE-APPS: The license only permits {{quota}} apps deployed at the same time.

LOGIN.TITLE: Sign in
LOGIN.INVALID-CREDENTIALS: 用户ID或密码有误，请重新输入

ACTIVATE.TITLE: Activate account
ACTIVATE.ACTIVATING-MESSAGE: Hold on tight {{userFullName}} we're activating your account...
ACTIVATE.SUCCESS-MESSAGE: Your account has been activated. Please sign in below to start designing and running processes
ACTIVATE.FAILURE-MESSAGE: Your account cannot be activated. Either it has already been activated or the activation link has expired.

RESET-PASSWORD-REQUEST.MESSAGE: Forgot your password? Enter your email address below to receive an email to reset your password.
RESET-PASSWORD-REQUEST.TITLE: Reset password
RESET-PASSWORD-REQUEST.SUCCESS-MESSAGE: You will receive a mail shortly with a link to reset your password.

ERROR.UNEXISTING-USER: User with the given email address does not exist.

RESET-PASSWORD.TITLE: Reset password
RESET-PASSWORD.FAILURE-MESSAGE: Your password cannot be reset. The reset link is invalid or expired.

KICKSTART.TITLE: 流程及应用定义
KICKSTART.DESCRIPTION: 创建流程模型，表单和应用程序定义。

TASKS.TITLE: 任务管理
TASKS.DESCRIPTION: 访问完整的任务列表，并处理从任何流程应用程序分配给您的任何任务。

IDENTITY-MANAGEMENT.TITLE: 用户管理
IDENTITY-MANAGEMENT.DESCRIPTION: 用户信息管理：更改密码，姓名和其他设置。 作为管理员用户，管理用户和组。
IDENTITY-MANAGEMENT.DESCRIPTION-TENANT-ADMIN: Manage the users and groups in your organization.

POPUP.ADD-APP-SUMMARY: Add an app to your landing page
